u.a: laık ə hæv ə bıt ə sʌpə
voiced dental fricative replaced by voiced alveolar plosive;

g.ga: Daddy get out of the way
I'd like to see the ducks again

u.a: voiceless palato-alveolar affricate replaced by voiceless dental frictive;

g.ga: Jenny must not do it again

u.a: voiced dental fricative replaced by voiced bilabial plosive;

dæs ə ræɡ n̩ bəʊn mæn
mə [*] laık ə drıŋk ə wɔtə

mɑ [*] laık sʌm hʌni ɒn ıt
emphatic , contradicting Jenny's statement that toast is burning;

g.ga: there's no need to blow on mine

u.a: maınz nɒt tə bləʊ ɒn ıt əgeın
after Jenny had asked Mummy to blow on her toast;
responding to Jenny's request that she put toy animal away;

g.ga: I'm going to kiss your cheek

u.a: maınz [*] ɡʊın tə kıs ɔ [*] tʃi:k
mine's = I'm; palatal semi-vowel omitted in "your";

referring to completed action - past tense not used;
voiced dental fricatives replaced by voiced alveolar plosives;
